name: sbx
description: A library to work with pascalcoin in nodejs and the browser.

scripts.build: webpack --env dev && webpack --env build && npm run test
scripts.test:cover: cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc --reporter=html mocha --recursive --require babel-register --require babel-polyfill --colors "./test/**/*.spec.js"
scripts.test:cover:core: cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc --reporter=html mocha --recursive --require babel-register --require babel-polyfill --colors "./test/Core/**/*.spec.js"
scripts.test:cover:layer2: cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc --reporter=html mocha --recursive --require babel-register --require babel-polyfill --colors "./test/Layer2/**/*.spec.js"
scripts.test:cover:crypto: cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc --reporter=html mocha --recursive --require babel-register --require babel-polyfill --colors "./test/Crypto/**/*.spec.js"
scripts.test:cover:rpc: cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc --reporter=html mocha --recursive --require babel-register --require babel-polyfill --colors "./test/RPC/**/*.spec.js"

author: Benjamin Ansbach <benjaminansbach@gmail.com>
